input.sentences: last week | we had a family reunion .
everyone who could came over to my house .
everybody made sure to have their pictures taken .
we never knew when we would see each other together again .
output.sentences: This week is the family reunion.
It will be in my Aunt's house.
This is a great picture of my grandparents.
We plan to take lots of family pictures.
I love seeing these cousins again at the reunion.
